sentences.sContent: The Beijing model in this context seems like a natural counterweight to America’s ideological hegemony.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Beijing model in this context seems like a natural counterweight to America’s ideological hegemony.
sentences.sCn: 在这样的背景下，北京模式似乎是美国意识形态霸权天然的抗衡力。

trans.tranOther: a situation in which one state or country controls others
